::FZ::

FZ nods. "I see."

He looks down at his wrist comp, identical to Zardus', and taps a few 
buttons. "What Zardus programmed into her should be in the Alliance 
base's logs, I think its reusable."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Squizzy::
> 
> "Only half her motherboard was salvagable and even then, there was 
> damage. Three quarters of her spark chamber was useable, I had to 
fix 
> up the rest of it. She lost about a third of her memory. But to be 
on 
> the safe side, I uploaded a program that will keep her loyal to 
> Zardus. But I don't think that she is quiet the same as she was.  
If 
> zardus could give me the program he installed in her initially, I 
can 
> upload it into her programs and return her to about 95% of what she 
> was before she got killed the first time."
